inclusion.criterion: Adult male and female patients, including women of childbearing potential
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least 18 years of age, inclusive
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant (or legally authorized representative) capable of giving signed informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical findings and an imaging study consistent with ARDS;
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A requirement for mechanical ventilation ≤ 48 hours prior to enrollment.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Evidence of increased inflammation as assessed by hsCRP > ULN AND at least ONE of the following being > upper limit of normal (as available): ferritin, procalcitonin, D-dimer, fibrinogen, PT/PTT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Immunocompromised patients, patients with known immunodeficiencies or taking potent immunosuppressive agents (e.g., azathioprine, cyclosporine)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Anticipated survival < 72 hours as assessed by the Investigator.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Participation in other clinical trials of investigational treatments for COVID-19
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Suspected or known active systemic bacterial, viral (except SARS-CoV2 infection), or fungal infections
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known active or latent tuberculosis (TB) or history of inadequately treated TB
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active hepatitis B or hepatitis C
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known history of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection with a detectable viral load or CD4 count < 500 cells / mm3
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status x 2-3 days with O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
